name: BurdenBot
description:
Burdenbot is a game that sees you collaborating with a Robot to mass produce space animals and make tons of profit. But be careful, your metal colleague can sometimes be a bit of a burden since you need to manually assign him tasks (that can sometimes be the opposite of what you're trying to do). 

This game was made in 72 hours for Wowie Jam 4.0

Music by: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0R2njnemjabXDt06nupwYA
